game.title: Rise of the Ancient Prophecy
game.objective: Fulfill the prophecy by retrieving the lost artifact
game.description: You have been chosen to embark on a journey to discover an ancient artifact that will restore balance to our realm. Follow the clues left by quest giver, Aria.

task.objective: Meet Aria at the entrance to the Enchanted Forest
task.description: Gather information about the artifact's location from Aria.
